show.title: Leid Stories

header.title: My Cab Ride From Hell: A Political Metaphor

title: My Cab Ride From Hell: A Political Metaphor
content:
A harrowing cab ride home one rainy night is recalled as a perfect metaphor for where we are as a nation: Relegated to... <!--more--> the back seat as mere passengers, we’re in the hands of a government that can’t see where it’s going but won’t take directions.
In the real-life story, Utrice makes an awesome decision and gets home.
Politically speaking, she asks, are we as a nation prepared to the same?
